transcript:
healthygamer is a digital mental health
platform that's designed to help
especially young people with the
problems of the digital age we do
everything from psycho education on our
twitch and YouTube channels as well as
community-run events that help people
learn some of the skills that kids in
the digital age have difficulty
developing and we also have a peer
support program that helps people with
things like forming social connections
finding direction in life we think it's
really important to meet people where
they're at in their language in their
online spaces where they're talking
about their anxiety or their isolation
or their loneliness on places like
Discord and twitch that's where we want
to be we want to spread psycho education
about different mental health conditions
to ten thousand a million people in one
shot there is a huge movement for better
mental health for breaking down social
barriers I think it's creating a huge
cultural shift and it's been beautiful
